forecast.day_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow.  Cloudy, with a high near 32. Northwest wind around 5 mph.  Total daytime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of freezing rain before 3am, then a slight chance of snow between 3am and 5am, then a slight chance of snow and freezing rain after 5am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
